page.title: 18MOTORWAY SURVEY-M1 40/41
page.content: On July 4th we did a motorway survey.We were split up into 6 groups of 3.Every group took a lane of the motorway.Our results are as follows: Northbound_211 cars and 106 lorries. Southbound_159 cars and 97 lorries. This was all done from 10,o clock to ten past 10 i.e.10 minutes. CONCLUSIONS 1.Northbound on the M1 has more traffic because it is nearer to Leeds and the M62. 2.There are twice as many cars and lorries going towards North. 3.There are 1.6 times as many cars than lorries going towards South. North Ossett High School
